item.title: G4
item.description: Grassland-4 (G4) Description Permanent grassland Intensively managed and fertilised Have more than 3 cuts per year First cut is after 15.05.2018 Located on the border of Hesse and Lower Saxony Location map {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addProviderTiles","args":["Esri.WorldImagery",null,null,{"errorTileUrl":"","noWrap":false,"zIndex":null,"unloadInvisibleTiles":null,"updateWhenIdle":null,"detectRetina":false,"reuseTiles":false}]},{"method":"addPolygons","args":[[[[{"lng":[9.93071658427673,9.93076082372521,9.93005498258494,9.93001443938269,9.93071658427673],"lat":[51.392418859282,51.3922006370259,51.3921405744998,51.3923656221989,51.392418859282]}]]],null,null,{"lineCap":null,"lineJoin":null,"clickable":true,"pointerEvents":null,"className":"","stroke":true,"color":"yellow","weight":1,"opacity":1,"fill":false,"fillColor":"#cccccc","fillOpacity":0.2,"dashArray":null,"smoothFactor":0.5,"noClip":false},null,null,null,null,null]}],"limits":{"lat":[51.3921405744998,51.392418859282],"lng":[9.93001443938269,9.93076082372521]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Subplot distribution map
